snippet: A federal judge in Oregon denies a motion for new trial in a case involving a self-described “investigative blogger,” Crystal L. Cox that raised issues over whether bloggers are journalists.
abstract: A federal judge in Oregon denies a motion for new trial in a case involving a self-described “investigative blogger,” Crystal L. Cox that raised issues over whether bloggers are journalists.

headline.main: Judge Clarifies That Bloggers Can Be Journalists (Just Not One in Particular)
